about_the_game:
Dollhouse Corp. is the world's leading manufacturer of toys with AI. The company's business is thriving, but there is one problem. Sometimes smart toys get out of control and take over company factories. But Dollhouse Corp. is also a frugal company! They employ squads of Scavengers who go to captured factories and collect materials that the company needs. Are you ready to become a Dollhouse Corp. scavenger and risk your life for $10? Congratulations, you are hired!

Gameplay


Your team arrives at one of the abandoned Dollhouse Corp. factories. It is captured by smart toys, some of them are neutral towards you, while others are madly eager for your death. Your task is to look for various trash, extract materials from it and gradually open new areas of the location

Crafting


Using the collected materials, your team will be able to create various useful tools and improvements, as well as survive in the abandoned factory. You can make devices to open locked doors in a location

Toys


Rabbits are mostly harmless. You can even trade junk with them. But if you take more from them than you give them in return, they will bite your head off! And this is the last good news for today. Because the rest of the toys: Thumper, Spider, Teddy Bear, Doll and many others will kill you as soon as they see you

Hide and seek

Does everyone want to kill you? Don't worry, scavengers. You can hide from bloodthirsty toys in toilet rooms and closets. But remember, there are not enough places to hide and seek for everyone! So choose a place to hide and before your mates and stay alive and with money

Money


Sell excess materials and save money for improved equipment. Maybe one day you will even have enough money to retire! Although this is unlikely

content_descriptors.notes: In the game you can see scenes of violence and death

name: Dollhouse of Dead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In this co-op horror game, your team visits abandoned toy factories. Collect various junk, extract materials from it, create and improve your equipment. And try to survive, because while you are exploring the dark dungeons of factories, bloodthirsty toys are hunting you
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
